did.abstract: The Boyce family papers include an agreement by the Architectural Iron Works company of New York City to hire Daniel D. Boyce as a foreman, 1858; and a patent issued to Ellen B. Boyce for a washing machine, 1862.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The two documents in this collection are housed in a single folder with no particular arrangement.
